body:
Travis build on develop (https://travis-ci.org/spack/spack/builds/345051054) was failing with `lib/spack/spack/test/cmd/test_compiler_cmd.py .share/spack/qa/run-unit-tests: line 31:  8344 Killed`

I suspect this is an issue with resource limits on travis so this PR is intended to investigate that
title: check system messages for info on killed unit test process
